summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of streaming services, including music, video, and gaming streaming. Customers can take advantage of exclusive discounts and promotions by signing up for the loyalty program, which rewards customers with points that can be redeemed for discounts on future purchases or even free products and services. Contoso Wireless is always expanding their streaming library with new content, offers customer support 24/7, and has an online community for customers to connect and share tips.
